ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Camelot
ygData.msgSnippet: I find it too simple.. and like EQ if you don t group.. it s about as fun as watching the preverbal paint dry.  The personalization of individual characters is
ygData.messageBody:
Message
I find it too simple.. and like EQ if you don't group.. it's about as fun as watching the preverbal paint dry.  The personalization of individual characters is probably the best thing about it.  Other then that, I can't help but consider it a yawn fest.  There are some improvements over EQ, but not enough to keep me playing beyond a week.. 2 at the most.  To each his own, aye. 
-----Original Message-----
From: ZeonChar [mailto:ZeonChar@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 23, 2001 3:13 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Camelot

I agree. It is like EQ, but better.
 
----- Original Message -----
From: LeSamLam@...
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, October 23, 2001 5:14 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Camelot

My husband has been playing it.  In fact, after a few days, he cancelled his EQ account and is solely playing DAoC.  He keeps telling me to try it but I tell him I like EQ just fine.  From watching him, I can tell I don't wanna play.  BUT he's a hardcore gamer and EQ and Solitaire are the only games I play.  He says it's like EQ but better.  

Lena


have u guys (anyone I mean) heard of the new Dark Ages
of Camelot game?? I heard it is like EQ but not so
long, have any of you plsyed it?? I looked around at
the stores here in my crappy town & didn't see it but
I have heard good things.... anyone know?
